name: Bullet Hell Cannon
description:
Shoot targets in the shortest amount of time!!

But beware, the cannonball you shoot can and WILL backfire on you

Play the game with 4 options of difficulties!

Simply by shooting the "number" block and you can switch the difficulties between:

Baby mode - 5 targets

Infant mode - 10 targets

Toddler mode - 50 targets

Normal grown adult - 100 targets
